response.answer_text: Clients seek out a coach when they are stuck and need help moving forward in whatever it is they’re trying to do.When someone who’s struggling discovers that your coaching services will help them figure out their next steps, prospective they get excited and optimistic. For getting new students for your training, you can use your coaching contract template as a reference document to engage your prospect clients if they have any concerns about your terms and conditions. Such a template provides a great way to extract objections and find common ground to close the deal.Introducing such a formal agreement while negotiating with a new client provides the following things which are important for marketing your coaching services: Coaching Agreement (Free Downloadable Template) Your coaching contract template shows the client that this isn't your first coaching experience, and you mean business. In other words, having a professional agreement gives you credibility.It sets clear expectations of what your coaching fees are, which is motivating for your client to put in the work to get the most value from your coaching.It frees up your time to empower your clients, instead of following up on compliance and the fine print of your relationship.
